Knut can you please attach a .launch file for one of the external tool 
builders causing problems? 
Found in the .externalToolBuilders folder.

It looks like you have a javaHomePath that has no segments?

When I upgraded to M9 I lost all my preferences.
The default JRE location was set to d:\. I fixed this and can now edit the ant
builders.
Thanks for the report. Our code should handle this error case.
Fixed in AntCorePreferences to handle paths with no segments.
